pageProduct.name: Anthogenol Anti-Ageing Facial Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Anthogenol Anti-Ageing Facial Serum is a professional strength antioxidant skin treatment formulated to help combat the visible signs of daily oxidative stress. A proud tribute to the remarkable legacy of Professor Masquelier’s® Original OPCs and Anthogenol, Anthogenol Anti-Ageing Facial Serum harnesses the benefits of scientific innovation and over fifty years of research to provide a targeted solution for concerns related to ageing skin.

Warnings

Suitable for all skin types , Not tested on animals.

Common Uses

Anthogenol Anti-Ageing Facial Serum with MASQUELIER’s Original OPCs provides advanced antioxidant action to combat skin ageing and pigmentation, fortified with premium essential oils to hydrate and soften. Formulated for day and night use, the lightweight, bioactive formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling plumper, and helps improve texture and appearance for a revitalised complexion.

Ingredients

Aqua, Isopropyl Myristate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Jojoba), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Palmitoyl Grape Seed Extract, Urea, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol (Vit E), Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Backhousia Citriodora Leaf Oil (Lemon Myrtle), Citral, Citrus Aurantium Amara Flower Oil (Bitter Orange)

Directions

Dispense a pea-sized amount of serum onto palm of hand and smooth evenly over the face and neck in an upward and outward motion. For best results, use every morning and evening after cleansing and before moisturising
